ISSUE.TITLE: Drone fails to delete build
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It appears the latest master branch is failing to delete builds, I can't work out whether this is an issue with my local docker setup or an issue with drone: From `/var/log/upstart/drone.log`: ``` starting build failed to completely delete build image 0015cf3ad5614eb242946bbc09d0fd8e286f3f4a7e4fc46e1ead5d342d691c9d. Not Found ``` Docker info: ``` root@docker-01:/# docker version Client version: 1.3.0 Client API version: 1.15 Go version (client): go1.3.3 Git commit (client): c78088f OS/Arch (client): linux/amd64 Server version: 1.3.0 Server API version: 1.15 Go version (server): go1.3.3 Git commit (server): c78088f root@docker-01:/# ``` Running on Ubuntu 14.04. Any other info I can provide?

COMMIT.MESSAGE: add option not to convert pipelines for repo import (#625)
